ComicInfo.Title: The Road Trip; A Short History of Sex; The Goose and the Gander Were Talking One Night; The Super-Colossal, All Galactic, Beltmoore Brothers, Mega-Momentous Circus and Medicine Show; Anything Goes; Mr. Walsh will be over...; The Dream of the Birdmen; Gwendlyn Wretch; Summer was new...
